title: Duplicate volumes from antibody to lot

value.scriptCode:
# Get the containing entity where the script is embedded
entity = seal.get_containing_entity()
fields = entity.get("fields", {})

# Define the mapping between 'AUTO' fields (source) and their corresponding manual fields (target)
# This mapping is derived from the field names present in the provided entity JSON.
field_mappings = {
    "Recommended titrated volume (uL) AUTO": "Recommended titrated volume (uL)",
    "Av1 (uL) AUTO": "Av1 (uL)",
    "Av2 (uL) AUTO": "Av2 (uL)",
    "Av3 (uL) AUTO": "Av3 (uL)",
    "Av4 (uL) AUTO": "Av4 (uL)",
    "Av5 (uL) AUTO": "Av5 (uL)",
    "Tv1 (uL) AUTO": "Tv1 (uL)",
    "Tv2 (uL) AUTO": "Tv2 (uL)",
    "Tv3 (uL) AUTO": "Tv3 (uL)",
    "Tv4 (uL) AUTO": "Tv4 (uL)",
    "Tv5 (uL) AUTO": "Tv5 (uL)",
    "GD1v1 (uL) AUTO": "GD1v1 (uL)",
    "GD2v1 (uL) AUTO": "GD2v1 (uL)",
    "NK1v1 (uL) AUTO": "NK1v1 (uL)",
    "NK1v2 (uL) AUTO": "NK1v2 (uL)",
    "NK1v3 (uL) AUTO": "NK1v3 (uL)",
    "NK2v1 (uL) AUTO": "NK2v1 (uL)",
    "NK2v2 (uL) AUTO": "NK2v2 (uL)",
    "NK2v3 (uL) AUTO": "NK2v3 (uL)",
    "TICv1 (uL) AUTO": "TICv1 (uL)",
}

# Check if any target fields already have values
for source_field_name, target_field_name in field_mappings.items():
    target_field_value = fields.get(target_field_name, {}).get("value")
    if target_field_value is not None:
        seal.throw_error(
            "There are some values in the fields you are trying to copy into. "
            "Some of these may have been manually entered, so we don't want to override them."
        )

# If no target fields have values, proceed with copying
for source_field_name, target_field_name in field_mappings.items():
    source_field_value = fields.get(source_field_name, {}).get("value")
    if source_field_value is not None:
        seal.update_field_value(target_field_name, source_field_value)
        print(f"Copied '{source_field_value}' from '{source_field_name}' to '{target_field_name}'")
    else:
        print(f"Source field '{source_field_name}' has no value to copy.")

print("Script finished successfully.")
